Plot: A banished hero of Rome allies with a sworn enemy to take his revenge on the city.
Title: Coriolanus
Actors: Gerard Butler, Ralph Fiennes, Lubna Azabal, Ashraf Barhom
tomatoConsensus: Visceral and visually striking, Ralph Fiennes' Coriolanus proves Shakespeare can still be both electrifying and relevant in a modern context.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 10 wins & 16 nominations.
